definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
swelling of the head (physical condition)/fig. swellheaded/conceited

sentences.english: That depends upon the diameter DD of the swell set.
sentences.chinese: 那就要看你DD的发胀后的直径定。

sentences.english: Do you have the sensation of distension and numbness at needling?
sentences.chinese: 扎针时您有麻木和发胀的感觉吗？

sentences.english: Acupunture may cause a little pian and a certain feeling of numbness and distention.
sentences.chinese: 针灸可能有点疼，还会使您感到有点麻木和发胀。

sentences.english: When I insert the needles into points you may have a feeling of soreness.
sentences.chinese: 扎针时您有麻木和发胀的感觉吗？

sentences.english: I just got sprung from the stacks, my brain was mushing out.
sentences.chinese: 我刚看完一堆书，头都发胀了。

sentences.english: The European felt energetic while the others felt bloated!
sentences.chinese: 欧洲人觉得精力充沛可是其他人却感觉肚子发胀。

definition: to ache/to be sore/to feel painful
swelling of the head (physical condition)/fig. swellheaded/conceited
